topic.h3: Basic Search
topic.p: Basic search is a principally new feature for legal systems - one string search. In contrast to traditional query cards, there is not need to find the necessary field to enter this or than document detail, it is enough to write in the single line any know information on the document or situation under consideration, and GARANT System will determine what documents meet the criteria most perfectly.
The new search procedure is similar to the use of Internet search servers (Yandex, Rambler, Google and other) that are familiar and do not cause any difficulties.
topic.h3: New Interface
topic.p: The new interface offers a significantly simpler, lighter and optimised look combining full functionality and simplicity in work. The most frequently requested functions are placed in the forefront.

Optimised structure - the items are grouped into sections in a most logical manner meeting user tasks. As compared to the Main Menu of the previous version of GARANT System, many items are shifted to other parts of the interface. The Main Menu design is made simpler and more convenient.

All buttons of the new interface toolbar are larger, most of them accompanied by signatures. The main principle of placing the buttons on the toolbars has changed. In the EXPERT version, they carry the buttons invoking the main functions that are used most frequently.

The task bar is a new element of the interface specifying the system's professional features for working with any object (document, list, search function). The task bar is a tab on the navigation panel listing the main commands in the form of hyperlinks that apply to the current open object. The goal of this tool is to simplify the interface without loosing a convenient and quick access to the system's professional functions.
topic.h3: Transfer of Search-by-Details Values to the On-Line Legal Advice Service Query Card
topic.p: When applying to the On-Line Legal Advice Service, the search details from the report of unsatisfactory search will be placed automatically in the query card to the On-Line Legal Advice Service.
topic.h3: Checking Connection to the On-Line Legal Advice Service
topic.p: The query card to the On-Line Legal Advice Service contains a hyperlink "Check Connection to the On-Line Legal Advice Service". A click on the link will generate and send automatically a test request to check the connection status.
topic.h3: Graphic Design of the Legal Advice Printout
topic.p: The legal advice is printed out on a special form.

topic.h3: Improved Work with Comments in the Document Text
topic.p: User comments are turned off in the current document only. They re-appear automatically if you switch over to another document.
topic.h3: Links for Quick Transfer between List Documents
topic.p: The document status bar carries a pictogram for quick transfer to the next or previous list document, as well as for quick return to the list itself.
topic.h3: AutoFit Feature for Printing Large Tables
topic.p: When printing the tables that do not fit the standard sheet width, the system will automatically reduce the table font and change the sheet orientation (portrait or landscape). In most cases, it permits to adapt the width of a large table to the size of the sheet and produces a printout more suitable for work and reading.
topic.h3: Screentips to Internet Links in the Document Text
topic.p: If the text of the document has a link to an Internet resource, the screentip to it will show the words Internet Link before the address. If you click on it, the browser will be launched to open the appropriate page.
topic.h3: Graphic Pictograms to Mark the Details
topic.p: All values that may be selected for searching are supplied with a pictogram to set the mark.
topic.h3: Finding Exact Matches in Context Search
topic.p: A new feature is implemented in the context search - you can enter an exact word or phrase. To do it, enclose the necessary words in inverted commas ("). In this case, the system will find an exact context without the word forms, synonyms etc.
topic.h3: Optimisation of Document Names in the List
topic.p: The list shows only document names without the dates of amendments. If the document has been changed, the phrase "With Amendments" will appear in brackets. The full story of changes may be shown if you open the document text and read the heading.
topic.h3: Improved Save-List-to-File Dialogue Box
topic.p: The save-list-to-file dialogue box permits to choose whatever you need to save - the whole of the list or selected documents only, names of documents from the list or their full texts. The latter permits to choose also the method of saving - in a single file or each document separately.
topic.h3: Improved Save-to-My-Documents Dialogue Box
topic.p: The Save and Overwrite buttons are united in a single one. Now, if you place the highlight over the object already saved in My Documents while saving an element and press the Save button, GARANT System will show a warning to check if you really want to replace the earlier saved folder or bookmark with a new object.
topic.h3: Denying user self-registration
topic.p: A new feature is added in the administrator interface permitting to deny user self-registration in the system. If it is turned on, the system will show a dialogue box inviting the Administrator to enter the contact information (telephone number and e-mail address) permitting the user to contact him.
topic.h3: Context Filter and Packet Operations for User List
topic.p: Opportunities of a context filter of the total user list are added in the administrator interface. In the case of a large number of registered accounts, it permits to find quickly the necessary user information in the list.

An opportunity to remove or disconnect from the system several users simultaneously has also been implemented. To do it, select in the administrator interface the users to disconnect from the system or the accounts to remove, after which, apply the appropriate function.
topic.h3: More Vivid Icons to Notify of Important Events
topic.p: Large hexagonal icons have been animated to report the reception of answers of the On-Line Legal Advice Service and the changes of flagged documents. If you place the cursor on any of the notification icons, it acquires the form of a hand with a pointed finger as if on a hyperlink.
topic.h3: Object Sorting in My Documents Folder
topic.p: The objects saved in My Documents folder will be sorted automatically by the type (Folders\Requests\Lists\Bookmarks), and the objects of the same type, in the alphabetical order in addition.
topic.h3: Vivid Design of Active and Non-Active Tabs
topic.p: The colour pattern has changed to display the active tabs in the navigation panel and the main system window. Now, the current tab is highlighted white, differentiating it clearly from the non-active tabs. Besides, if you place the mouse cursor on any tab, its name underlined.
topic.h3: Vivid Indication of the System Busy Status
topic.p: If you carry out a prolonged operation, the progress indicator is shown (versicoloured strip) to inform that a long process is underway. The progress indicator is shown as a separate element when saving document to file and exporting to MS Word. In Print Preview, the same indicator is shown in the status bar in the lower part of the screen.
topic.h3: Information Type Renamed
topic.p: The information type Comments, Explanations, Charts has been renamed into Comments.
